ComicInfo.Title: The Stolen Battleship Plans; Lucifer's Plot against the Earth; The Space Insurance Racket; Thriller in Manila; Voyage to Planet Zutar; The Kali Cult; The Fang and the Fortune; The Diamonds of Wah-Lama
ComicInfo.Summary: Samson and David look into the theft of stolen battleship plans by a Nazi Bund.
